warning.title: Warning
warning.mobile: The LevelImposter Editor was not designed to run on a mobile device. However, your mileage may vary.
warning.browser: While LevelImposter Editor will work with any modern browser, Chromium-based browsers (Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, Brave) will render much faster while working with larger maps.

minimap.title: Minimap
minimap.errorNoSprite: The object does not have a sprite attached to it. Minimap will not be visible in-game.

sprite.title: Sprite
sprite.okSize: Your image is small enough to not cause any issues.
sprite.errorSize: Larger images can sometimes freeze or crash the game. Try downscaling or splitting your sprite into multiple objects.

audio.okSize: Your audio is small enough to not cause any issues.
audio.errorSize: Larger sound files can sometimes freeze or crash the game. Try reducing the channel count or bitrate.
audio.errorNotSupported: Your browser does not support the audio element.
audio.errorNoCollider: This object is missing a collider. Audio only plays to players who are within the collider.
audio.errorNoSound: This object is missing a sound file. (Unity will only support .wav files)

trigger.errorNoCollider: This object does not have a collider. (Trigger is fired when a player enters/exit the collision area)

stepSound.title: Step Sound
stepSound.okSize: Your audio is small enough to not cause any issues.
stepSound.errorSize: Larger sound files can sometimes freeze or crash the game. Try reducing the channel count or bitrate.

task.title: Task
task.errorNoRoom: This task is not attached to a room.

transform.title: Transform
transform.name: Name
transform.errorInvisible: This object will not be visible in-game.
transform.errorNoSprite: This object will not be visible in-game unless you attatch a sprite.
transform.errorMinimap: This object will only be visible in the minimap.
transform.errorFreeplay: This object will only be visible in freeplay mode.

collider.title: Colliders
collider.errorOneOnly: This object can only have 1 collider

room.title: Room
room.errorNoCollider: This object does not have a collider. Admin Table will not function and name will not popup for players.

sab.title: Sabotage
sab.errorNoRoom: This object does not have a room. Sabotage will not function properly.

map.newDialogText: Are you sure you want to create a new map? This will delete all elements and reset the map.
map.tooLargeError: Map is over the 50MB limit for uploads. You may still play locally, but you cannot upload until you remove or compress any custom sprites, gifs, and sounds.
map.tooLargeWarn: Map is near the 50MB limit for uploads. It is reccommended you remove or compress any custom sprites, gifs, and sounds.

publish.title: Publish Map
publish.errorEmailNotVerified: You must verify your email before publishing maps.
publish.errorNotAuthor: You must be the author of this map to publish it.

account.noMaps: You have not published any maps.
